PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17142012-12-13EC,  HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectProhibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2012
PrecisPROHIBITION OF CERTAIN TOXIC SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS, 2012, in order to add four items to the list of prohibited substances, consolidating the Prohibition of Certain Toxic Substances Regulations, 2005 and the subsequent amendments, streamlining the regulatory text, and improving its clarity and consistency.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0285 Publication Date: 2013-01-02
